26c45884-64ee-48b8-b407-dd43ffcf929d.description: At the core of the Oxford University Business Economics Programme is an intensive, two-week development course for the next generation of senior leaders. By combining high-calibre academic tuition, industry-leading keynote speakers, and a diverse group of delegates, OUBEP creates a dynamic space to explore economic theory and applications to help solve problems and create strategic impact.
26c45884-64ee-48b8-b407-dd43ffcf929d.name: OUBEP Summer Programme 2021 - Markets & the Globalised Economy

issuer.summary: issued by Oxford University, Department of Economics

badge_template_activities.title: Through online lectures/workshops, this programme is designed to equip you with the essential economic knowledge to grasp the workings of modern economies. Through a series of current applications, you will explore fundamental economic principles driving key issues of our time: prevalence of inequality and its implications for individuals and entire economies, the reasons for and the consequences of quantitative easing or the importance of startups and young businesses for innovation and growth.

0b9fa21f-1794-430e-8ae8-14cc9241f2f6.description: At the core of the Oxford University Business Economics Programme is an intensive, 5-day development course for the next generation of senior leaders. By combining high-calibre academic tuition, industry-leading keynote speakers, and a diverse group of delegates, OUBEP creates a dynamic space to explore economic theory and applications to help solve problems and create strategic impact.
0b9fa21f-1794-430e-8ae8-14cc9241f2f6.name: OUBEP Summer Programme 2022 - Fundamental Economics

issuer.summary: issued by Oxford University, Department of Economics

badge_template_activities.title: Fundamental Economics offers participants an intensive overview of the World of Economics. We will start with the fundamentals of supply and demand, and finish with the latest state-of-the-art models of economic growth. Our programme gives participants the economic grounding necessary to understand current issues, such as climate change, globalisation and the potentially long-lasting economic impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.

267b3ac3-d4d2-474b-8124-36642c4763e4.description: For the first time, 2022 offered a 20-lectures only package covering 10 topics as a development course for the next generation of senior leaders. With World leading and high-calibre academic tuition and online tutor support, OUBEP creates a dynamic space to explore economic theory and applications to help solve problems and create strategic impact.
267b3ac3-d4d2-474b-8124-36642c4763e4.name: OUBEP Summer Programme 2022 - Fundamental Economics (Online Lectures Only)

issuer.summary: issued by Oxford University, Department of Economics

badge_template_activities.title: Fundamental Economics offers participants an intensive overview of the World of Economics. We will start with the fundamentals of supply and demand, and finish with the latest state-of-the-art models of economic growth. Our programme gives participants the economic grounding necessary to understand current issues, such as climate change, globalisation and the potentially long-lasting economic impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.
